channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EA Sports’ College Football 25 Deluxe Edition Cover Revealed
item.description: The deluxe edition cover of EA Sports' College Football 25 was revealed in an update to the PlayStation Store on Friday morning, generating even more excitement for the long-awaited video game ahead of its summer release.

item.title: Jackie Robinson Statue Thief Pleads Guilty, Facing 19 Years In Prison
item.description: The 45-year-old man who stole and destroyed a Jackie Robinson statue in Kansas pled guilty on Thursday to multiple charges, including theft, and is now facing over 19 years behind bars! Remember, the large Jackie statue was stolen on January 25…

item.title: New USL Super League Team Dallas Trinity FC Unveils Name, Logo
item.description: New professional women's soccer team in North Texas will begin inaugural season in August and play out of historic Cotton Bowl stadium

item.title: Oprah Winfrey Apologizes for Perpetuating Diet Culture
item.description: Oprah Winfrey is acknowledging the role she played in toxic diet culture -- and she's now trying to rectify that ... by embracing weight loss drugs. The talk show legend opened up about her influence in the weight loss industry during a 3-hour live…

item.title: Paris Saint-Germain Draws From Urban Art Scene for 2024-25 Home Kit
item.description: Traditional red-and-white Hechter stripe returns to center of jersey, but is "reinterpreted with a fluid and dynamic brushstroke style"

item.title: Dana White's Viral FedEx Delivery Video Leads To Driver's Firing
item.description: The FedEx driver who carelessly tossed over a dozen packages into his truck has been fired by the delivery giant ... after Dana White captured the incident on camera before posting it on social media, where it went viral! In case you missed it,…

item.title: Report: WNBA Expanding to Toronto for 2026
item.description: The WNBA is crossing the border! According to a CBC report, Toronto will be getting a Women’s National Basketball Association expansion franchise for the 2026 WNBA season. Kilmer Sports Inc., led by Toronto billionaire Larry Tanenbaum, will own the franchise. The report says the league’s official announcement is expected to

item.title: 'Taxi Driver' Writer Says Martin Scorsese's Dog Ate Part of His Thumb
item.description: Martin Scorsese might have the follow-up to his classic "Raging Bull" ... 'cause apparently, he's living with a raging dog -- one that maimed his longtime collaborator. Paul Schrader -- a legendary Hollywood screenwriter and director -- spoke with…

item.title: Report: Fanatics NHL Jerseys to Debut in June
item.description: The NHL’s shift to Fanatics on-ice jerseys could be revealed as soon as next month, according to former NFL quarterback Boomer Esiason. While on his morning Boomer and Gio radio program, Esiason revealed that the new Fanatics NHL jerseys for all 32 teams (Utah too?) would be revealed sometime in

item.title: Zedd Sells Lavish Encino House That Belonged to Joe Jonas, Sophie Turner
item.description: Zedd is saying sayonara to one of his Los Angeles area homes ... as he sold the mansion for a pretty penny, TMZ has learned. The DJ officially parted ways with the 6-bedroom Encino estate, with the sale going through on Thursday for $17,125,000 ...…
